responses.rationale: 'exports just a fraction' and 'reported its first commercial case' report economic/numerical data factually.
'total turkey production... was usually about 8.5 to 9 million birds' and 'just over one million had died or been culled' report numerical metrics factually.
The segment describes symptoms and duration, not primarily economic data or prices.
The segment reports case numbers and transmission, not primarily economic data or prices.
